description:
Sabato`s mother informs everyone that Sabato has to return to the future, but Sakura tries to stop her from leaving, thus everyone ends up in a prison cell. Many attempts to escape go very wrong.
Dokuro makes Sakura chocolate, shaped of himself, for Valentine`s Day. However, she adds a special "binkan sausage" which makes Sakura really "special" and also gives him an allergic reaction.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: (03/04) Accidents Happen in Closed Spaces, Dokuro-chan! / Valentine`s Day Kiss! Dokuro-chan!
Jiken wa Misshitsu de Okoru yo! Dokuro-chan! / Valentine`s Day Kiss Da yo! Dokuro-chan!
事件は密室で起こるよ!ドクロちゃん! / バレンタインデー キッスだよ!ドクロちゃん!
